text: Ami shakushi Ami jakushi (網杓子) is a skimmer used in the Japanese kitchen. The skimmer is made from a fine wire mesh and is used to remove small pieces of unwanted food or foam from a liquid. For example, in deep frying, the ami jakushi is used to remove small drops of batter during the frying of tempura. Another example would be the removal of foam from a miso soup to achieve a more pleasing aesthetic. == See also == * Spider – Chinese utensil * List of Japanese cooking utensils Category:Japanese cooking tools
title: Ami jakushi
